text: 9.28: Ais 53.12; Ro 6.10; Ta 2.13; 1 Pi 2.24; 2 Pi 3.12; 1 Zo 3.5Mba tɨvara, Krais, ana tuga bueŋra wo ndi Fhe Bakɨme nɨɨŋgiap, kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigir vhɨrve muuŋgi tɨvi vhɨzɨr zav, mben simtɨgi ndiav, ana nduara wora ofa muuŋgi. Ana zumgum, wom phenatɨtɨgɨp zirɨrga. Ana mba tugen zirɨrga, ana gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzɨr zav zeri fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mba guigira ana khothɨgap anan rarga ki gumgi gu mbigi, ana mben nɨɨn za suaŋgi bigi, ana guigira za ntan mben nɨɨŋgirga.
